name: Name of your experiment
description: Explains the what and the why. What is the main idea? What is the purpose? Describes the coding process and implementation choices and gives a high level system overview.

name: Circles Experiment 1
description: This experiment explores the use of circles in a grid layout, utilizing random walks to create interesting patterns.

name: Circles Experiment 2
description: This experiment builds upon the first by introducing new color schemes and more complex patterns.

name: Circles Experiment 3
description: The third experiment in the series, focusing on interactivity and user input to modify the circle patterns.

name: Squares Experiment
description: This experiment investigates the use of squares in a grid layout, exploring different sizes and colors to create visually appealing designs.
